name: GAT Sport Flexx EAAs+ Hydration
description:
GAT Sport Flexx EAAs+ Hydration

Product description

FLEXX EAAs delivers all 9 Essential Amino Acids (EAAs) for complete muscle protein synthesis. The result: Muscle preservation, energy, enhanced endurance, and recovery. This total amino acid profile features 7g of EAAs, with 5g in the clinically preferred 2:1:1 ratio. For stress mitigation and improved vitality, it includes 125mg of the adaptogenic herb Sensoril Ashwagandha. Our amazing flavors provide hydration support that’s truly delicious, anytime: Pre, Intra, and Post-Workout. For the hard training athlete, FLEXX EAAs is the complete muscle and recovery solution.
short_description:
GAT Sport Flexx EAAs+ Hydration

  • Essential Aminos – Each serving of Flexx EAAs contains 7g of Essential Amino Acids to help promote muscle protein synthesis
  • Adaptogen Driven Vitality Support – Flexx EAAs provides 125mg of Ashwagandha to help promote better Cortisol support
  • Enhanced Recovery – In addition to EAAs, each serving is packed with 5g of Branched Chain Amino Acids to support better recovery
  • Balanced Hydration – Coconut water provides a balanced mixture of minerals and electrolytes to support optimal hydration levels
  • Endurance Fuel – Flexx EAAs are perfect for any activity from weight lifting to hiking, bicycling and anything in between

name: GAT JETMASS 720GM
description:
GAT JETMASS, Creatine (720 g)

Key Factors

  • 5 g Creatine Monohydrate
  • 1 g Glutamine
  • 1 g BCAAs
  • 1 g Waxy Maize

Improved Formula - Build Muscle Size & Strength Faster

JetMass provides a superior Creatine driven formulation for athletes with goals for exercise-induced gains in muscle, strength and performance specifically formulated to increase uptake of Creatine, add lean muscle mass, increase muscle torque and speed recovery times. JetMass now contains 5 grams of pharmacological grade Creapure Creatine monohydrate, the recommended daily level supported by research. No form of Creatine delivers creatine uptake into muscles better than Creatine Monohydrate.

JetMass Formula Advantages:

  • 5 grams Creapure Creatine Monohydrate, a source of pure Creatine manufactured in Germany.
  • Contains 13 grams of Carbohydrate, Waxy Maize, Maltodextrin, and Dextrose to promote creatine uptake by spiking insulin.†
  • Contains Phosphates to buffer the build up of lactic acid from strenuous training.
  • Contains 2 grams of Glutamine plus BCAAs to support muscle anabolism and recovery.

name: GAT Carbotein - 3.85 lbs 50 servings
description:
GAT Carbotein - 3.85 lbs 50 servings

Product description

Maximize muscular output, recovery and building! * Carbotein is a scientifically advanced carbohydrate formula for glycogen loading that enables rapid energy use along with post-workout recovery. Carbotein uniquely combines 6 fast-acting, specialty carbohydrates with branched chain amino acids plus multiple electrolytes and citric acid cycle intermediates. Drink before, during, and/or after training to support maximum: muscular work output and endurance, glycogen replenishment and loading, muscle building (anabolism). * The driving force of carbotein is fuelgen, gat’s proprietary carbohydrate matrix. It consists of half a dozen specialty carbohydrates selected to encourage rapid yet sustained delivery of glucose fuel throughout your muscular body. * Glucose critically impacts your ability to perform, recover, and gain. It is your body’s most “preferred” fuel, particularly during high-intensity training!

Ingredients:

Calories 120::Total carbohydrates 30g::Sugar 3g::Vitamin C 123mg::Calcium 70mg::Sodium 140mg::Potassium 190mg
short_description:
GAT Carbotein – 3.85 lbs 50 servings

  • 1300 Mg of branched chain amino acids (BCAAs), to support muscle anabolism.
  • High performance glycogen loader
  • Supports muscular output and endurance

name: GAT Whey Protein 5 lbs
description:
GAT Whey Protein - The Scoop (5 lbs)

  • Fast Acting 100% Whey Protein
  • 25 Grams Protein
  • 3 Grams Carbs
  • Satisfaction Guaranteed – GAT Authentic
  • 68 Servings
  • Dietary Supplement
  • Naturally and Artificially Flavored

Nutrition Profile

25 g Protein
3 g Carbs
2 g Sugar
2 g Fat

Premium Whey Protein Isolate Blend Maintain and Build Lean Muscle

Each scoop of GAT Whey Protein is packed with 25 g of fast-acting 100% premium whey protein that gets straight to work on your muscles. Each scoop contains over 5 grams of BCAAs from protein. Mixes super easy and tastes amazing.

Low in Carbohydrates, Sugar, Sodium and Fat

This premium source of whey protein delivers a low-carb, low-fat protein blend with only 3 g carbs, 2 g sugar, and 2 g fat. Low carb protein powders have been shown to accelerate fat metabolism and feed and define lean muscles you have been working so hard to build. Start reaping the benefits!

Tastes Incredible

The high quality protein source delivers amazing rich thickness and taste with each dessert-like flavor. Reach your goals quicker while enjoying each delicious protein shake even more. You’ve worked so hard to get there, enjoy GAT’s Whey Protein shake…as your reward! GAT Sport delivers 4 amazing, low carb protein flavors: Vanilla, Chocolate, Cookies & Cream and Coffee.

Suggested Use

Mix one heaping scoop with 8 fl oz of cold water or milk in a shaker bottle or blender. Add 4 fl oz of water or milk for each additional serving used. Recommended to use 1-3 servings daily in conjunction with a healthy diet and resistance exercise program.

Great for: Smoothies, pancakes, popsicles, muffins and pudding.

Other Ingredients

Protein blend (whey protein isolate, whey protein concentrate), natural flavor, cocoa powder (alkalized), guar gum, xanthan gum, protease, sucralose, salt, acesulfame-k, bromelain, lactase.
short_description:
GAT Whey Protein – The Scoop (5 lbs), Chocolate

  • About The Product 100% Whey Protein Source With Only 3 Carbs Great Source Of Clean Protein With Digestive Enzymes To Support An Improved Digestion And Assimilation Of Protein Into Muscles
  • Four Delicious Flavors: Vanilla, Rich Chocolate, Cookies And Cream And Coffee
  • Great Tasting Gat Sport Whey Protein Is An Optimal Source Of Protein To Help Build And Maintain Muscle.

name: GAT Testrol Gold ES, 60 Tablets
description:
GAT Testrol Gold ES, 60 Tablets

  • Muscle & Male Performance
  • Estrogen Support
  • Dietary Supplement
  • Satisfaction Guaranteed - GAT

Testrol Gold Estrogen Support the Gold ES Advantage 

Testrol Gold ES is GAT's specialty men's testosterone booster. This advanced formula naturally supports male performance and testosterone, with the added benefit of hormone regulators.

Contains DIM, short for 3,3' - diindolylmethane, a compound from indole-3 carbinol (I3C), a phytonutrient that offers estrogen balance support for men. DIM supports the activity of specific enzymes that support normal estrogen ratios that optimizes testosterone hormone levels.

Added testosterone boosting: PrimaVie, a high quality, clinically proven, shilajit mineral deposit from the Himalayas. Studied to increase total testosterone, free testosterone and DHEA.

Suggested Use

Adult men, take 2 tablets every day on a light to empty stomach. Cycle 8 weeks on and 2 weeks off (complete 2 bottles).

  • Drink 2 glasses of fruit juice or fast acting carbohydrates within 1 hour after every workout to optimize insulin activity.
  • Consume 4,000 to 5,000 IU Vitamin D3 a day.
  • Consume 5 grams of BCAAs (Branched-Chain Amino Acids) after every workout.
  • Takes 5-10 grams of Creatine daily.
  • Get proper sleep.

Other Ingredients

Microcrystalline cellulose, stearic acid, film coat (hypromellose, polydextrose, sodium carb- oxymethylcellulose, titanium dioxide, talc, maltodextrin, dextrose, medium chain triglycerides, mica, soy lecithin, FD&C yellow #5 lake, FD&C red #40 lake, FD&C yellow #6 lake, FD&C blue #2 lake), croscarmellose sodium, magnesium stearate, silica and dicalcium phosphate. Contains soy and wheat.
short_description:
GAT Testrol Gold ES, 60 Tablets

  • 60 Tablets
  • Helps build lean tissue
  • Enhance training performance
